body.name: Corsair VENGEANCE LPX DDR4 16GB (2x8GB) 3200MHz CL16 Intel XMP 2.0 Computer Memory - Black (CMK16GX4M2E3200C16)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 58 mins
features: Hand-sorted memory chips ensure high performance with generous overclocking headroom
VENGEANCE LPX is optimized for wide compatibility with the latest Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards
A low-profile height of just 34mm ensures that VENGEANCE LPX even fits in most small-form-factor builds
A high-performance PCB guarantees strong signal quality and stability for superior overclocking ability

A solid aluminum heatspreader efficiently dissipates heat from each module so that they consistently run at high clock speeds.Supports Intel XMP 2.0 for simple one-setting installation and setup.Available in multiple colors to match the style of your system.Limited lifetime warranty provides complete peace of mind
body.description: Vengeance LPX memory is designed for high-performance overclocking. The heat SP reader is made of pure aluminum for faster heat dissipation, and the custom performance PCB helps manage heat and provides superior overclocking headroom. Each IC is individually screened for performance potential. The DDR4 form factor is optimized for the latest Intel DDR4 motherboards and offers higher frequencies, greater bandwidth, and lower power consumption than DDR3 modules. Vengeance LPX DDR4 modules are compatibility-tested across Intel DDR4 motherboards for reliably fast performance. They're available in multiple colors to match your motherboard, your components, or just your style.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.8 4.8 out of 5 stars 3,552 ratings 4.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed more RAM and the Corsair VENGEANCE LPX DDR4 16GB (2x8GB) did the trick. They are an excellent brand that works hard and plays harder. I liked it so much that I ordered two more and I now have a total of 32 RAM. Sixteen RAM would have done the trick but since I like to play some pretty intensive MMORPG's as well as single player games, I saw no reason not to buy two more. I have had zero issues and definitely recommend Corsair Vengenance to any and everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is good ram at a fair price for music editing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like the low profile
reviews.reviewText: Again I purchase Corsair ram for its reliability, longevity and this time around for its low profile too. Compared to my other Corsair ram for a socket 1366 board, this ram sets quite a bit lower, and even lower than my EVGA ram on my socket 1151 board. I was so use to dealing with higher profile ram thru the years, when I seen these they looked a bit odd being that short with heatsinks... Lol. Put these sticks in for another build and it was absolutely problem free. Board auto set the correct speed, voltage and xmp profile right off, didn't have to do a thing but check it in the bios.Corsair is good ram and as usual the first thing I do is test the memory. These tested out great, zero issues and to be honest I wasn't expecting anything less. I highly recommend Corsair for memory modules, I've yet to see any of mine go bad, although there could be that one chance in millions... that's good odds imo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to increase the memory on my new computer and boy did these do the trick. I'm no computer techie dude, but know enough not to blow a computer up, well at least not again. (Long Story There)They went in easily, other than the space I had to put them in was rather small, so not an issue on their part. The memory works great, and was easily integrated right into the system.I'm not rich, so I look for value, and these are a great value, and I have had absolutely no issue with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Brand memory at a value price.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to add memory to my new build without breaking my bank account. This item is just what I needed and seems to be working solid. No issues to report. All is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better performance than expected
reviews.reviewText: Worked with no problem and above average performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You can't go wrong with Corsair RAM. They're the best of the best. Great deal, great quality. Absolutely no problems with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still loyal to Corsair Vengeance RAM sticks
reviews.reviewText: This is the sixth RAM Kit from Corsair I've bought for my personal and family PCs and still, pure quality. Easy so install and overclock. Stable and reliable. Always recommended.

Excelentes módulos ram para pc los uso con ryzen 5 5660g, active el perfil y una mother ASUS prime b550-a- AC, aunque puedes encontrar módulos de las misma frecuencia y capacidad por menor precio corsair es calidad van de maravilla asignando 4gb a la vram de mi Ryzen en dual channel.
Works amazing once I figured them out I hadn’t pushed them in far enough the first time tryed a few more times untill I got it now works perfectly I’m new to this stuff so it took me abit
Passade i datorn och gjorde den lite snabbare än tidigare.
Ottima RAM. Prezzo imbattibile, XMP/DOCP funziona perfettamente, ottima stabilità anche sotto stress.Molto consigliato per quelli che vogliono costruire un computer senza RGB

Corsair VENGEANCE LPX 16GB DDR4 3200MHz C16: Potencia y Rendimiento InigualablesCuando se trata de impulsar el rendimiento de tu PC, la elección de la memoria RAM adecuada es esencial, y el Corsair VENGEANCE LPX 16GB DDR4 3200MHz C16 se destaca como una opción de alto rendimiento que no te decepcionará. Este conjunto de módulos de memoria es una obra maestra de ingeniería de Corsair, una marca conocida por su compromiso con la calidad y la excelencia en componentes para computadoras.Diseño y Construcción Robusta:Los módulos VENGEANCE LPX presentan un diseño elegante y minimalista que se adapta perfectamente a cualquier configuración de PC, ya sea que estés construyendo una máquina de juego de alto nivel o una estación de trabajo para tareas intensivas. Están construidos con una calidad excepcional y una atención meticulosa a los detalles. La construcción de PCB de alto rendimiento y el disipador de calor de aluminio anodizado no solo mejoran la durabilidad, sino que también ayudan a mantener temperaturas óptimas para un rendimiento constante.Potencia Impresionante:Con una capacidad total de 16GB distribuida en dos módulos de 8GB, este kit de memoria proporciona suficiente espacio para ejecutar aplicaciones exigentes, editar video en 4K o disfrutar de los juegos más modernos sin problemas. La velocidad de 3200MHz y la latencia CAS 16 garantizan un rendimiento excepcional en todas las tareas, desde la multitarea intensiva hasta la carga rápida de aplicaciones.Compatibilidad y Facilidad de Uso:El Corsair VENGEANCE LPX 16GB DDR4 3200MHz C16 es compatible con una amplia gama de placas base DDR4, lo que facilita su integración en tu sistema existente o futuro. La instalación es sencilla, y la memoria se configura automáticamente para alcanzar su velocidad nominal, lo que significa que no tendrás que preocuparte por ajustes manuales complicados.Rendimiento Confiable:Corsair es sinónimo de calidad, y estos módulos de memoria no son una excepción. Han sido sometidos a rigurosas pruebas de calidad y estabilidad para garantizar un rendimiento confiable en todas las condiciones. Ya sea que estés jugando a tus juegos favoritos, editando contenido multimedia o realizando tareas profesionales, puedes confiar en que la memoria Corsair VENGEANCE LPX funcionará sin problemas.En resumen, el Corsair VENGEANCE LPX 16GB DDR4 3200MHz C16 es una elección sobresaliente para aquellos que buscan llevar el rendimiento de su PC al siguiente nivel. Su diseño elegante, construcción robusta y rendimiento impresionante lo convierten en una inversión inteligente para cualquier entusiasta de la informática. Con Corsair, puedes estar seguro de que estás obteniendo la mejor calidad y confiabilidad en cada producto que compras.Sin duda, lo recomiendo 10/10 y no tengo nada negativo.
